doc:
Robert Alda https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Alda 0 Robert Alda (born Alphonso Giuseppe Giovanni Roberto D'Abruzzo; February 26, 1914 – May 3, 1986) was an American theatrical and film actor, a singer, and a dancer. He was father of actors Alan and Antony Alda. Alda was featured in a number of Broadway productions before moving to Italy during the early 1960s. He appeared in many European films over the next two decades, occasionally returning to the U.S. for film appearances such as The Girl Who Knew Too Much (1969). Robert_Alda ( born Alphonso_Giuseppe_Giovanni_Roberto_D'Abruzzo ; February_26_,_1914 – May_3_,_1986 ) was an_American_theatrical_and_film_actor , a_singer , and a_dancer . He was father of actors_Alan_and_Antony_Alda . Alda was_featured in a_number of Broadway_productions before moving to Italy during the_early_1960s . He appeared in many_European_films over the_next_two_decades , occasionally_returning to the_U.S. for film_appearances such_as The_Girl Who_Knew_Too_Much_(_1969_) .
